metadata.title: CVE-2017-6076 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In versions of wolfSSL before 3.10.2 the function fp_mul_comba makes iteasier to extract RSA key information for a malicious user who has accessto view cache on a machine.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6076` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl15 - 3.13.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.13.0+dfsg-1').
